Method Detail

getRequestPath

public static java.lang.String getRequestPath(HttpServletRequest req)
util function to take a servlet request and compute the path relative to the server (not relative to the webapp). needed when getPath() is relative to the webapp instead of the server

Parameters:
req - The request to inspect
Returns:
The path requested.

pathWithParams

public static java.lang.String pathWithParams(java.lang.String base,
                                              java.util.Map params)
Create a URL with parameters tacked on. Used in redirects and programmatic URL creation with parameters. Handles URL encoding of incoming keys and values as well.

Parameters:
base - baseUrl to compute path from
params - params to fillout on the URL
Returns:
String path

requestParamsToQueryString

public static java.lang.String requestParamsToQueryString(ServletRequest request)
Creates a encoded URL query string with the parameters from the given request. If the request is a GET, then the returned query string will simply consist of the query string from the request. If the request is a POST, the returned query string will consist of the form variables.

Note: This method does not support multi-value parameters.

Parameters:
request - The request for which the query string will be generated.
Returns:
An encoded URL query string with the parameters from the given request.

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String string)
Encodes the specified string with a UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
string - The String to encode.
Returns:
The encoded String.
